class.name: VisualScriptYieldSignal
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node yielding for a signal.
class.description: [VisualScriptYieldSignal] will pause the function execution until the provided signal is emitted.

members.member: The base type to be used when [member call_mode] is set to [constant CALL_MODE_INSTANCE].
[code]call_mode[/code] determines the target object to wait for the signal emission. See [enum CallMode] for options.
The node path to use when [member call_mode] is set to [constant CALL_MODE_NODE_PATH].
The signal name to be waited for.

constants.constant: A signal from this [Object] will be used.
A signal from the given [Node] in the scene tree will be used.
A signal from an instanced node with the given type will be used.
